## Functions

### applyR1() {#a8e8a0cd1e0e21531b3b6cf88878ee77b}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename GraphT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>void llvm::PBQP::applyR1 (GraphT &amp; G, typename GraphT::NodeId NId)</>}>
Reduce a node of degree one.

Propagate costs from the given node, which must be of degree one, to its neighbor. Notify the problem domain.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/pbqp/reductionrules-h/#l00030">30</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/pbqp/reductionrules-h">ReductionRules.h</a>.
